data.title: Unfortunately closed
data.text: This was a tasting room, but has now been closed. You can, however, sample, drink and buy their wines once a month at Essencia Bakery. Every first Friday of the month they have wines, entertainment, and just-cooked yummy food.

data.title: Pizza not great!!!!!!!!!!!
data.text: We went to Look Out Winery with another couple on Saturday the 20 of June.  The wine was okay but the House Specialty & Pepperoni Pizza were burn on the bottom and neither one of them had enough ingredients!!   On the Pepperoni  Pizza I ordered & paid for bell peppers and mushrooms you could hardly see any of either on the pizza.  The crust was great the parts that was not burn. Pizza Hut & New York Pizza both make better pizzas.

data.title: Wine and relax
data.text: this was our last stop to tasting rooms. And by far our favorite! One of the owners were there and he was so plesent and gave us so much info about the wine and was so friendly to all who were there. We opted to try a bread and goat cheese plate along with our tasting. I was so pleasent the bread was made there and was a great addition to our wine. We will be going back this next spring and will be stopping to visit again!!!! The wine from this winery was by far our fave all in ll the reds were delightful. give it a try
